review: Love it, it was very easy to set up...Was using it within 10 mins of opening box!! Highly recommend this, esp if you own an iPad, Galaxy, or any comparable wireless device

review: Excellent concept at an awesome price.  Limited apps right now.  Works a bit sluggish .. seems like some network connectivity related even though I have 3 bars of wifi coverage where my TV is.

review: Works as expected.  No skipping, no issues.  Using it with a WIFI that is 20 feet away that may make a difference for you.
